title: Authors and Citation
text: person) (2023). sdp: Stochastic degradation process. R package version 0.1.0, https://liangliangzhuang.github.io/sdp/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {sdp: Stochastic degradation process},   author = {{person)}},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://liangliangzhuang.github.io/sdp/}, }

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: goal sdp provide engineers practical guidance analyze data using common degradation models: Wiener process, Gamma process, Inverse Gaussian process. degradation process, provide data simulation generation, statistical inference, remaining useful life prognostics.

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: can install development version sdp GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("liangliangzhuang/sdp")

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: sdp functions fall five main categories: “Simulate” can simulate group degradation. “Inference” contains maximum likelihood estimator (MLE) Bayesian method. “Plot” contains several visualization functions, mainly plotting degradation paths, reliability remaining useful life. See plot_path(), RUL_plot(), Reliability_plot, Reliability_cowplot(), RUL_3D_density(). “Others” contains useful functions. See cumsub().
code: library(sdp) ## basic example code

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: basic example shows solve common problem. use sim_dat() generate simulated Wiener degradation process, group 6, time epoch t = 1:200. denote parameters μ = 2, σ = 3. output list: () first part list amount degradation simulated data, (ii) second part increment degradation. Using plot_path() function plot simulated degradation data.  object ggplot, can add related function change plot. example, let’s change theme pattern.

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: section, provide tutorial parameter estimates using MLE Bayesian methods. methods integrated sta_infer() function just need set "method".

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: output MLE dataframe contains point interval estimates.
code: mle_fit = sta_infer(method = "MLE", process = "Wiener", type = "classical", data = dat[[1]]) mle_fit #>         low   mean     up #> [1,] 1.8831 2.0606 2.2380 #> [2,] 3.0025 3.1280 3.2534

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: output Bayes resampling rstan. According object, can process, e.g., prognostic, check .

title: Stochastic degradation process
text: Based statistical inference, use Reliability() RUL() calculate Reliability RUL, respectively. using Reliability_plot() RUL_plot() plot.
code: reb = Reliability(t = 50, threshold = 150,par = mle_fit,                        process = "Wiener",type = "classical") Reliability_plot(R_time = 1:150,sum_para = mle_fit,threshold = 150,                  process = "Wiener",type = "classical") rul = RUL(t = 1:100, cur_time = 100, threshold = 150, data = dat[[1]],     par = mle_fit[,2], process = "Wiener", type = "classical")  RUL_plot(fut_time = c(50,55,60,65,70,75,80),time_epoch = 1:100,                 threshold = 150,zlim = c(0,0.05),xlim = c(0,100),                 para = mle_fit[,2],                 real_RUL=c(NA,NA,NA,NA,NA,NA)+40) #> $rect #> $rect$w #> [1] 0.2499835 #>  #> $rect$h #> [1] 0.1139012 #>  #> $rect$left #> [1] -0.1004324 #>  #> $rect$top #> [1] 0.1683858 #>  #>  #> $text #> $text$x #> [1] -0.02995602 -0.02995602 -0.02995602 #>  #> $text$y #> [1] 0.13991046 0.11143515 0.08295984

code: dat <- sim_dat(group = 6, t = 1:200, para = c(2, 3), process = "Wiener") mle_fit <- sta_infer(method = "MLE", process = "Wiener", type = "classical", data = dat[[1]]) Reliability(t = 50, threshold = 150, par = mle_fit, process = "Wiener", type = "classical") #> [1] 0.9980162

title: NASA 锂电池数据 — lithium_battery
text: 该数据是 NASA Ames Prognostics Center Fxcellence (PCoF）对商用锂离子 18650 电池进行充、放电试验获得的一组蓄电池容量变化数据。试验过程中，锂离子在室温下 经历 3 种不同的运行剖面，即充电、放电和测量 EIS。 充电是以恒流模式(CC)进行，在 1.5A 电流下直到电池电压达到4.2V，然后以恒压模式(CV)继续充电直到电流降到 20mA。 放电也以恒流模式进行，放电电流为2A，直到电池电压降低到2.7V。 重复充电和放电将导致蓄电池老化。

title: NASA 锂电池数据 — lithium_battery
